alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 12:09PM CST until February 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn affecting Webster, Bossier and Bienville Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Expect minor lowland flooding with the boat ramp suffering overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM CST Sunday was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.4 feet on 04/26/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 1215 PM CST.
